owl:Ontology.dc:title: covid19
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: covid19
owl:Ontology.terms:provenance: v2.0 Added new annotations to the ontology using standard/well-know annotation properties v1.5. Removed protege.owl import and references. Made ontology URI date-independent v1.4.
owl:Ontology.dc:description: An ontology about covid19 to spread the awareness to the general public about, Coronavirus, infection possibilities, precautions and symptoms of the disease.
